siteData.title: Raul Melo - Personal website and Blog
siteData.description: Developer, writer in my spare time, tech addicted, open-source lover who believes the only way to transform lives is through education.

cv.description1: To provide a better experience and ease the maintainability of a single source of true, I keep my CV in a public Google Docs file.
cv.description2: From there, you'll be able to print or export in the extension you need.
